alternatives.transcript: every day around the world nearly 200,000 people go to work for the same group of companies a group with factories and offices in more than 80 countries this is the world of baat Industries a truly Global operation be a
is the world's most International cigarette manufacturer

in 1992 the group manufactured over five hundred and seventy-five billion cigarettes giving it over 10% of the world's tobacco market baat Industries is also a leading provider of personal financial services and is one of Europe's largest Insurance Groups with famous names like eaglestar and Allied Dunbar in the United Kingdom and farmers in the United States
although one of Britain's largest companies baat Industries has a staff of only 100 at its head office in London
this is because baat believes in setting clear guidelines for its businesses and then delegating day-to-day management directly to its operating companies

be 80s tobacco operations have more than 100 factories in 50 countries each of these operations benefits from be 80s worldwide expertise in marketing and distribution production and in technology and research and development over the last 10 years baat has invested over 2,200 million u.s. dollars in Factory modernization

factories which range from the more traditional style to one of the world's most advanced at Southampton in the United Kingdom currently undergoing rapid expansion this commitment to investment is nowhere more evident than at be 80s newest company at pH in Hungary a typical example

but baat is not only involved in cigarette Manufacturing

unique amongst tobacco companies baat has a strong commitment to tobacco growing baat does not itself grow the tobacco instead it offers the support that allows over 400,000 independent Farmers to do so baat does this by providing financial and technical assistance on crop inputs and curing and by agreeing to buy the tobacco from the farmers at realistic prices
wherever be 80 can help local farmers to grow tobacco profitably it does so
in nearly half of the 50 countries where baat has cigarette factories it also has Leaf development operations

this development of domestic tobacco crops reduces the need to import leap and so saves often scarce Foreign Exchange in some countries where the leaf quality is suitable tobacco can also be exported not just saving foreign currency but actually earning it for the host country

around the world be 80s brands are among the best-known with a range of over 250 International Regional and National Brands the quality and reputation of these brands are supported by promotional activities and Innovative and effective advertising

world for over 90 years

be 80s expertise in every aspect of the tobacco industry ensures its place as the world's most International Tobacco Company expertise in both International and domestic Brands catering for all tastes around the world expertise in the full range of Technology from the most advanced to more traditional methods

expertise in all stages of tobacco growing and processing baat believes that its employees are its greatest asset that is why it's committed to encouraging employee involvement and to ensuring the health and safety of all its employees all be 80 companies offer competitive remuneration packages and provide extensive training and development to their employees be
T Industries has a worldwide reputation as a good corporate Citizen and draws its strength from its commitment to the cultures and traditions of the countries in which it operates
